mapper.select: SELECT s.office_id, SUM(use_limit) AS used_limit FROM trains.sys_office_account s LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office_statement os ON s.office_id = os.office_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(os.create_date,'%Y-%m') = #{format} GROUP BY s.office_id HAVING used_limit > 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO trains.train_refund_order ( order_id, order_type, arrearage_price, arrearage_office, add_time, order_status ) VALUES
( #{item.order_id}, 1, ${item.used_limit}, #{item.office_id}, NOW(), 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE trains.sys_office_account oa INNER JOIN (SELECT arrearage_office FROM trains.train_refund_order WHERE order_status = 1 GROUP BY arrearage_office) s ON s.arrearage_office = oa.office_id SET oa.freeze = 1 WHERE oa.freeze = 0
